content: p age | 1 happy legs legwarmers for kids by dani sunshine materials notions approx 120 170 250 300 yards of any tapestry needle for weaving in ends sport weight yarn sizing needles instructions are given smallest size 1-3 us 4 /3 5 mm dpns or circular needle years size with larger sizes 4-6 years / 7- 100cm or longer if using magic loop 9 years / 10-12 years in parentheses method use size necessary to obtain gauge gauge 24 st per 4 inches 10 cm to begin co 42 50 54 58 st join the knit in the round being careful not to twist  work 10 12 12 12 rounds 1 x 1 ribbing knit 1 purl 1 repeat to end of round round 1 knit round 2 knit round 3 knit 1 purl 1 repeat to end of round repeat rounds 1 3 until legwarmers measure 6 8 5 10 11 inches from cast on edge or to desired length knit 2 rounds work 10 12 12 20 rounds of 1 x 1 ribbing knit 1 purl 1 repeat to end of round bobble all stitches loosely i recommend using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off weave in ends with a tapestry needle make another one pattern copyright © dani sunshine
